contentrichtext.text: '''Johann Aegidius Bach''' (9 February 1645 – November 1716) was the father of the [[composer]] [[Johann Bernhard Bach]], and [[organ (music)|organist]] and municipal [[orchestra]] director of [[Erfurt]], Germany. He was [[Johann Sebastian Bach]]'s uncle and [[Johannes Bach]]'s son. He was a [[viola]] player and performer in the Stadtmusikanten Kompagnie (municipal musicians band) in Erfurt.
